name: jsx-templating
description: Embedable templating library with minimal feature set. Uses JSX syntax for template definition.

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && browserify -s jsx-templating -e lib/index.js -t babelify | bfc > build/jsx-templating.js && browserify -s demo -e demo/demo.js -t babelify > demo/demo-built.js

author: Wesley Walser
